/* 대국민포털_게시물기본 목록 조회 (PstMapper.selectPstList) */ SELECT p.pst_sn ,p.bbs_id ,p.pst_ttl ,p.pst_cn ,p.pst_inq_cnt ,p.pst_kogl_cprgt_type_cd ,p.atch_file_id ,p.thmb_id ,p.ntc_yn ,p.del_yn ,p.wrtr_dept_nm ,p.mdfr_dept_nm ,p.rgtr_id ,p.reg_dt ,p.reg_prgrm_id ,p.mdfr_id ,p.mdfcn_dt ,p.mdfcn_prgrm_id ,f.atch_file_nm as thmb_file_nm ,f.atch_file_path as thmb_file_path FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_PST" p LEFT OUTER JOIN "KIDS_OWN"."TB_CA_M_ATCH" f ON p.thmb_id = CAST(f.atch_file_sn AS VARCHAR) WHERE p.bbs_id = #{bbsId} AND p.del_yn = 'N'
AND p.pst_ttl LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND p.pst_cn LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
ORDER BY p.reg_dt DESC

/* 대국민포털_게시물기본 조회 (PstMapper.getPst) */ SELECT p.pst_sn ,p.bbs_id ,p.pst_ttl ,p.pst_cn ,p.pst_inq_cnt ,p.pst_kogl_cprgt_type_cd ,p.atch_file_id ,p.thmb_id ,p.ntc_yn ,p.del_yn ,p.wrtr_dept_nm ,p.mdfr_dept_nm ,p.rgtr_id ,p.reg_dt ,p.reg_prgrm_id ,p.mdfr_id ,p.mdfcn_dt ,p.mdfcn_prgrm_id ,f.atch_file_nm as img_file_nm ,f.atch_file_path as img_file_path FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_PST" p LEFT OUTER JOIN "KIDS_OWN"."TB_CA_M_ATCH" f ON p.thmb_id = CAST(f.atch_file_sn AS VARCHAR) WHERE p.bbs_id = #{bbsId} AND p.pst_sn = #{pstSn} AND p.del_yn = 'N'
